example.text: There’s a clear pattern of foreign companies paying millions to Biden family associates and a third cut getting to family members. Legitimate businesses don’t operate this way. We have serious questions. The American people need answers. [[url]]

Mr. Speaker, HR 1059, the SECURE Notarization Act is a bipartisan bill that would authorize the nationwide use of remote online notarizations performed in interstate commerce. This is simply an electronic notarization where the party and the notary are in different locations.
